reviews.review: Ufff Half life 2, que puedo decir que no se haya dicho de este juegazo? Una increíble secuela de Half life 1, que para mí estuvo mejor que el primero en casi todos los aspectos, gráficos, física, personajes, historia aunque no todo fue tan bueno en Half life 2, el doblaje en español me pareció un asco total sentía que ni ganas le ponían al doblaje otra cosa que me molesto mucho fue la inteligencia artificial que tiene el juego, tus aliados se ponían atrás tuyo y no se movían, por lo general por eso te sacaban bastante vida más en el capítulo que tienes que destruir a varios Zancudos, se me ponían atrás y me mataban los Zancudos, también me paso lo mismo con las hormigas pero no era tan molesto y bueno te entretienes en el capítulo 9 usando a las hormigas como armas, también me gustó mucho ya casi al final del juego que no podía parar de jugarlo y el final que queda en incognito porque Gman nos mandó de nuevo a la tierra y que quería con la tierra
if you dislike this game, something is wrong with you physically and mentally.
this happened to my buddy Eric

it's basically the base for many other amazing source games, and the story is amazing. it's also quite mysterious (example: that cat). the only bad thing about it is the player model, and that's just with cheats, and the other source games fix that problem.
I know it looks like i have barely any play time on Half life 2 but i have seen many videos about it. You should buy this game as it has alot of content and in general is good

Half-Life 2 is a great story action game and I really think there is hope for a 3rd one once the source 2 engine is finished.

ОООООО ДА. Я ИСТИННЫЙ ФАНАТ ХАЛВЫ ПОЭТОМУ 100 ПРОЦ ОЧ КРУТАЯ ИГРА. Движок Source один из лучших
все друзья проходят киберпанк, а я перепрохожу халф лайф :D

Oyun zamanına göre gayet güzel yapılmış başlarda gözlerimi yordu biraz daha sonra ortama alışınca tamamlamak istedim. Bulmacalarla süslenmiş biraz korku biraz heyecan aksiyon dolu oyun güzel indirimde iken oynamak için alınabilir.

前面的解迷非常有趣，极具挑战性，有许多关卡的设计我不找攻略真的没办法想到，按攻略通关后又不由地感叹创作者的巧思。而游戏的后期我完全被创作者的想象力折服。巨大的三角机甲大战以及最后神乎其神地利用光影打造出极具质感与未来主义的甚至能用富有诗意来形容的最后城堡，即使放在当下仍然会是一个前卫经验的设计。还有值得一提的是游戏中有关武器的利用的设计亦然我感到新奇与佩服。一把刚开始的时候看着像解密的辅佐工具的反重力枪被赋予了丰富的游戏性与自由度，游戏中的方方面面几乎都能用反重力啊枪解决，甚至在某些情况下，反重力枪会产生比相对传统的枪支更惊人的效果，还有不能不提的是最后两章游戏赋予了反重力枪让人瞠目结舌的威力以及不凡的崇高使命。让这把反重力枪与弗里曼、最后的城堡成为我心目中半条命2的标志。
       当然半条命2以当下的眼光看，缺陷是不可能不存在的。最直观的就是受限于时代的画质，但是以一款十几年前的游戏来说，他的画面无疑是领先于那个时代的。还有就是在某些地图中，以来没有方向的指引，二来其场景的相似性极高，导致迷路是玩半条命2的日常。
       总的来说7块钱能玩到这样的游戏，毫无疑问这是steam里最具性价比的游戏之一(起码在我玩过的游戏里他）。半条命2是我在steam上买的第一款游戏，说来惭愧，前前后后断断续续经过了几年才通关。由于前期的解密对我来说有一定的难度，因此我搁置了好久。直到最近才重新拾起，且一口气打到最后。即使觉得解密对于你有一定难度，不需要找牛角尖（当然如果你的的确确想钻研当我没说），即使你看了攻略载去玩，也不会怎么影响你的游戏体验，因为它的设计真的很有意思。

Got this on the day of the initial release ... all those years ago.
It's still one of the best games ever!

Started playing this on The Orange Box back in the day, never got around to getting past the first couple chapters. After finishing it I've realized what I've missed. The linear design and quick paced story telling really keep you locked in during the important events in the story. 10/10 would recommend.

Good characters and writing.
Great story.
Great level design.

Cons:
The AI for the Combine is not hard at all sometimes.

Should you buy this?
Of course! It is a classic.

Still playable in 2020, with gameplay mechanics, graphics, story etc. Game's atmosphere always changes and keeps you interested in through all sequences. Surely Half Life 2 (and Half Life too) added a bunch of essential innovations to the game industry. So this classic game must be played or at least known by all story-based game lovers.
 One thing to add, I think the story is very overrated by players. Atmosphere and futuristic designs are important for sure, but the story line was not a major thing in the game for me.

A perfect sequel to Half-Life 1. Although the combat isn't as good and the weaponry isn't as unique as HL1, it's still a damn good game, with an amazing and interesting story, cool mechanics and unique areas.

Very much reccomended.
